name: Gengar
author: so-taro
flavor_text: You can hear tales told all over the world about how Gengar will pay a visit to children who are naughty.

abilities.name: Shadow Pain
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may put 6 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX in any way you like.

attacks.name: Twilight Poison
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.
